title: Does the fountain located at the northern end of N. Lumina Ave in Wrightsville Beach serve a purpose other than for appearance? The fountain seems to run intermittently and often overflows into the grass and eventually the street. I was curious if this serves a purpose other than for looks. Since it overflows and doesn't seem to recirculate I was thinking it may flush out the end of the water line or maybe provides drinking water for the birds in the area.
